The Montpelier School is accepting application/resumes for a full time 2nd shift custodian II until the position is filled.

Starting pay is $17.44 per hour, 260 day per year. Health, dental, vision insurance, personal, sick and vacation days.

Email resumeâ€™ to Pam Pawlowicz at ppawlowicz@montpelier-k12.org

or mail to

Montpelier Board of Education

PO Box 193,

Montpelier, OH 43543.

This is a reminder that both parent and student FinalForms are to be updated and signed online each year and are now available online for the 2024-25 school year.

Forms are required to be signed by ALL parents K-12 and Students 3-12.

FinalForms may be accessed using the link - https://montpelier-oh.finalforms.com

This is a reminder that both parent and student FinalForms are to be updated and signed online each year and are now available online for the 2024-25 school year.

Forms are required to be signed by ALL parents K-12 and Students 3-12. If your child is a 3rd or 4th grade student, we will allow additional student support for forms to be signed. I will be asking 3rd and 4th grade teachers to assist students with this process.

If you have not yet signed forms for the 2024-25 school year, an email and text have been sent to the contact information provded in FinalForms.

Parents:

Please make sure demographic and contact information is updated as needed.

This information is needed to help us to communicate with you if needed.

To help us ensure student privacy, FinalForms is used to verify parent/guardian information prior to setting up or sharing student online account information.

Students:

Starting Tuesday, September 10th, forms must be signed. Failure to have forms signed may result in the following:

Students will not be allowed to check out a loaner or borrow a charger without permission of an administrator.

One-time free repair of accidental damage will not apply

Possible loss of miscellaneous privileges.

FinalForms may be accessed using the link - https://montpelier-oh.finalforms.com

For Assistance or Questions, please contact:

Jim Lee

IT Director

Montpelier Schools

419-485-6717
